name: Infinite Resources Buildings with Investment Pool
short_description:
It might not be compatible with any mod that changes the economic laws, i will try to figure something up
I'm not the original creator, all credit goes to msg7086 for this amaizing mod , i just tried to update it to 1.2 and add the Investment Pool feature. Report any issues.
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2900363837
If the mod creator request i will take the mod down

Build any resource buildings on any land, including farms, plantations, mines and a few other resources.
Infinity Naval Base, Port, and Barracks are also added with no max level limitation.
The precondition to build those buildings are unchanged. That means you cannot build inland ports, and you must research first to unlock certain resource buildings.
This mod should not conflict with any other mod.
GitHub: https://github.com/msg7086-random-stuff/Vic3-Infinite-Resource-Buildings

USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
